info.name: JUNIPAY API V2

request.description:
This endpoint is used to initiate a disbursement transaction.

#### Request Body

- `amount` (number, required): The amount of money to be disbursed.
    
- `sender` (object, required): Details of the sender including name, email, and phone number.
    
    - `name` (string, required): The name of the sender.
        
    - `email` (string): The email of the sender.
        
    - `phone` (string): The phone number of the sender.
        
- `beneficiary` (object, required): Details of the beneficiary including name, email, and phone number.
    
    - `name` (string, required): The name of the beneficiary.
        
    - `email` (string): The email of the beneficiary.
        
    - `phone` (string): The phone number of the beneficiary.
        
- `beneficiaryAccount` (object, required): Details of the beneficiary's account.
    
    - `channel` (string, required): The channel of the beneficiary's account (e.g., mobile_wallet).
        
    - `mobileWalletNumber` (string, required if channel = mobile_wallet): The mobile wallet number of the beneficiary.
        
    - `mobileWalletProviderCode` (string, required if channel = mobile_wallet): The provider code of the mobile wallet.
        
    - bankAccountNumber (string, required if channel = bank): The bank account number of the beneficiary.
        
    - bankCode (string, required if channel = bank): The bank code of the beneficiary.
        
    - `nameOnAccount` (string, required): The name on the beneficiary's account.
        
    - `countryCode` (string, required): The country code of the beneficiary's account.
        
- `reason` (string, required): The reason for the disbursement.
    
- `foreignId` (string): The foreign ID associated with the disbursement.
    
- `callbackUrl` (string): The URL to which the callback response will be sent.
    

#### Response

The response is a JSON object with the following schema:

``` json
{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "status": { "type": "string" },
    "code": { "type": "string" },
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "status": { "type": "string" },
        "foreignId": { "type": "string" },
        "transactionId": { "type": "string" }
      }
    }
  }
}

 ```

response.name: 400 - Bad Request
400 - Bad Request - Account not found
400 - Bad Request
400 - Bad Request - Account not found

body.raw:
{
    "sendAmount": 1,
    "receiveAmount": 1,
    "exchangeRate": 1,
    "sendingCurrency": "USD",
    "receivingCurrency": "GHS",
    "sender": {
        "name": "SAMPLE SENDER ONE",
        "email": "senderone@gmail.com",
        "phone": "+233200000000",
        "countryCode": "USA"
    },

        "email": "raymond@gmail.com",
        "phone": "+233200000000",
        "countryCode": "GHA"
    },
    "beneficiaryAccount": {

        "mobileWalletProviderCode": "mtn",
        "nameOnAccount": "RAYMOND QUARSHIE MENSAH",
        "countryCode": "GHA"
    },
    "reason": "Sample remittance",
    "foreignId": "SAMREM0000000000001",

}
